>

> uses ModuleManager?

Thanks! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yes, we use Module Manager to translate the names of parts and part description, and .xml, .dll for UI text

> 
> Good translation!
> uses ModuleManager?

No, once used, but now I have to use their own module replaces the ModuleManager.
